body:
With the right tool kit it's easy to find an explicit answer: Selling out of the money strangles during earnings for Oracle Corporation has been a winner. This is the information that the top 0.1% have and now it's time for us all to see it.



Option trading isn't about luck -- this three minute video will demonstrate why and change your trading life forever: Option Trading and Truth Option trading isn't about luck -- this three minute video will demonstrate why and change your trading life forever:
title: Trading Options During Earnings in Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL)
